import { useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../styles/about.css"; // Import the image you provided import whyChooseUsImg from "../assets/images/user.png"; //import missionIcon from "../assets/images/weather.png"; // Placeholder - create or find an icon //import visionIcon from "../assets/images/world.png"; // Placeholder - create or find an icon import teamMember1 from "../assets/images/tour-argentina.jpg"; import teamMember2 from "../assets/images/tour-argentina.jpg"; import teamMember3 from "../assets/images/tour-argentina.jpg"; const AboutUs = () => { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); return (
{/* Section 1: Hero/Introduction */}

Discover Our Passion for Travel

Crafting unforgettable journeys and connecting you with the world, one adventure at a time.

{/* Section 2: Our Story / Mission & Vision */}

Our Journey, Your Adventure

Founded with a love for exploration and a commitment to exceptional service, TravelWorld was born from a desire to make extraordinary travel accessible to everyone. We believe that travel broadens the mind, enriches the soul, and creates lasting memories.

Our team of passionate travel experts meticulously curates each tour, ensuring authentic experiences, comfortable journeys, and moments of pure discovery. We're more than just a travel company; we're your partners in exploration.

{/* */}

Our Mission

To inspire and empower travelers to explore the world with confidence, curiosity, and a spirit of adventure.

{/* */}

Our Vision

To be the most trusted and innovative travel partner, connecting people to diverse cultures and breathtaking landscapes globally.

{/* Section 3: Why Choose Us (Inspired by your image) */}
{/* The dots from your image are not included as they imply a slider */}
Why Choose Us?

Adventure Awaits: Find Your Bliss With TravelWorld

We're not just about destinations; we're about the journey and the experiences that shape you. With TravelWorld, you get:

  • Expertly Crafted Itineraries
  • Passionate & Knowledgeable Guides
  • Commitment to Safety & Comfort
  • Authentic Local Experiences
  • Sustainable & Responsible Travel
{/* Optional Section 4: Our Team (Simple Version) */}

Meet Our Passionate Team

Alex Johnson

Lead Travel Curator

Maria Garcia

Customer Experience Lead

Sam Lee

Adventure Operations
); }; export default AboutUs;
